steps.title: Inquiry & Information Gathering
steps.description: Visit our website or contact our admissions office to learn about our programs, facilities, and admission requirements. Attend our open house events or schedule a campus tour.

steps.title: Application Submission
steps.description: Complete the online application form and submit required documents including birth certificate, previous school records, passport photographs, and application fee.

steps.title: Entrance Examination
steps.description: Applicants will be invited to sit for our entrance examination, which assesses English, Mathematics, and General Knowledge appropriate to the entry level.

steps.title: Interview & Assessment
steps.description: Successful candidates from the entrance examination will be invited for an interview with the school management and academic staff.

steps.title: Admission Offer & Acceptance
steps.description: Selected candidates will receive an admission offer letter. Parents must accept the offer and pay the required fees to secure the student's place.

steps.title: Enrollment & Orientation
steps.description: Complete final enrollment documentation and attend orientation programs to prepare for the academic year.

payment: Full payment at beginning of term (5% discount)

scholarships.name: Academic Excellence Scholarship
scholarships.description: Full or partial scholarships for students who demonstrate exceptional academic ability through entrance examinations and continuous assessment.

scholarships.name: Leadership Scholarship
scholarships.description: Awarded to students who have demonstrated outstanding leadership potential in their previous schools or communities.

scholarships.name: Arts & Sports Scholarship
scholarships.description: For students with exceptional talents in creative arts, music, or sports who can contribute to the school's extracurricular programs.

scholarships.name: Need-Based Scholarship
scholarships.description: Financial assistance for families who demonstrate genuine need and inability to afford full tuition fees.
coverage: Partial to full tuition waiver based on assessment

results.announcement: Results will be announced within 2 weeks of examination date
results.check: Results can be checked online using the candidate's registration number
